events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I am unsatisfied with the product.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer’s request for money back due to sizing issues.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your refund request so we can process it promptly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket was too tight and uncomfortable, so I would appreciate a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We can start the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back within 14 days using the prepaid label we will email you.
That sounds good to me. I will pack the jacket and wait for the prepaid shipping label in my inbox.
The refund request has been logged successfully. Once we receive the returned jacket, your refund will be processed immediately.
Following up to confirm if you have sent back the jacket and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I mailed the jacket yesterday using the label you provided. Please let me know when the refund is completed.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for your patience, and please contact us if you have any more questions or need assistance.
